translation.en: -[people speaking indistinctly] -[laughs]
translation.ja: ジョージア州 バーンズヴィル

translation.en: ♪ Hmm… ♪
translation.ja: “北部への誘い”

translation.en: ♪ Hmm… ♪
translation.ja: “仕事も自由もあり 南部より幸せ”

translation.en: Testing, testing, one, two, three. Testing, one, two, three.
translation.ja: マイクテストです ワン ツー スリー

translation.en: -Testing, testing, one, two-- -Got that list?
translation.ja: マイクテスト… リストは？

translation.en: Uh, I got it. Don't worry about it.
translation.ja: 用意してある

translation.en: I'm holding you responsible. You keep her in line.
translation.ja: 彼女を従わせろよ 騒動はゴメンだ

translation.en: I'm not putting up with any shenanigans. You hear, Irv? Irv?
translation.ja: 彼女を従わせろよ 騒動はゴメンだ おい

translation.en: Irv?
translation.ja: アーヴィン

translation.en: Irv!
translation.ja: おい！

translation.en: Not putting up with any Royal Highness, Queen of the Blues bullshit.
translation.ja: ブルースの女王でも関係ない

translation.en: Mother of the Blues, Mel. Mother of the Blues.
translation.ja: 母だよ 彼女はブルースの母だ

translation.en: Heh. You should've heard Levee at the club last night, Toledo. Trying to talk to that gal Ma had with her.
translation.ja: ゆうべ レヴィーが マ･レイニーの女に色目を

translation.en: You ain't got to tell me. I know how Levee do.
translation.ja: レヴィーはそういう奴(やつ)さ

translation.en: Levee tried talking to her and got his feelings hurt.
translation.ja: つれなくされてショゲてた

translation.en: I want you to get her in here, record those songs on that list, and get her out. -Just like clockwork. -[doorbell buzzes]
translation.ja: リストどおり録り 時間内に帰らせろ

translation.en: Like clockwork, Mel.
translation.ja: ああ メル

translation.en: And that horn player, the one who gave me those songs, is he going to be here today?
translation.ja: 曲を作るトランペット吹きも 来るのか？

translation.en: -I want to hear more of that sound. -How you boys doing, Cutler?
translation.ja: 曲を作るトランペット吹きも 来るのか？ 調子は？

translation.en: [Cutler] Fine, Mr. Irvin.
translation.ja: 上々ですよ

translation.en: Where's Ma? She with ya?
translation.ja: マ･レイニーはどこだ

translation.en: I don't know. She told us to be here at 1:00. That's all I know.
translation.ja: さあ　彼女から “１時集合”と

translation.en: Where's the, uh, horn player?
translation.ja: ペット吹きは？

translation.en: Levee's supposed to be here same as we is. I reckon he'll be here in a minute.
translation.ja: レヴィーもすぐ来るはず

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. Good morning, Chicago.
translation.ja: やあ シカゴのお嬢さん

translation.en: -[both chuckling] -[woman] He ain't from 'round here now.
translation.ja: よそ者だわ

translation.en: Come on in. I'll get you fed and ready to make some music.
translation.ja: リハを　食事は用意する

translation.en: Right down the hall.
translation.ja: さあ

translation.en: Where's Ma? How come she isn't with the band?
translation.ja: マ･レイニーは？

translation.en: Everything's under control, Mel. I got everything under control.
translation.ja: メル　気をもまなくていい 全て順調だよ

translation.en: Cutler, here's the list of songs we're going to record.
translation.ja: カトラー　収録リストだ

translation.en: [Mel] Why isn't she here? And where's that horn player?
translation.ja: マ･レイニーや ペット吹きは？

translation.en: What we got there, Toledo?
translation.ja: 曲目は？

translation.en: Eh, we got, uh…
translation.ja: どれどれ

translation.en: Mmm. "Prove It on Me," "Hear Me Talking to You,"
translation.ja: “プルーブ･イット･ オン･ミー” “ブラックボトム”

translation.en: "Ma Rainey's Black Bottom," "Moonshine Blues."
translation.ja: “ブラックボトム” “ムーンシャイン･ ブルース”？

translation.en: Oh. Them ain't the songs Ma told me.
translation.ja: マは嫌がる

translation.en: I wouldn't worry about it if I was you. Ma'll get it straightened out.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　話は彼女が通すさ

translation.en: [Cutler] "Moonshine Blues." That's one of them songs Bessie Smith sang, I believes.
translation.ja: “ムーンシャイン”は ベッシー･スミスの歌だ

translation.en: Eh, Slow Drag's right. I wouldn't worry about it.
translation.ja: マに任せておけ

translation.en: Levee know what time he's supposed to be here?
translation.ja: レヴィーは？

translation.en: Levee left the hotel talking about he was gonna buy shoes. Says it's the first time he beat you shooting craps.
translation.ja: 靴を買いに行ったよ お前に賭けで勝ったって？

translation.en: -I ain't thinking about no four dollars. -[Slow Drag] Levee sure was.
translation.ja: ４ドルな レヴィーは 散財する気満々だな

translation.en: [Toledo] Let me get a hit of that. [Slow Drag] That four dollars liked to burn a hole in his pocket.
translation.ja: レヴィーは 散財する気満々だな

translation.en: He's supposed to be here at 1:00.
translation.ja: だが遅いな

translation.en: -That's some good Chicago bourbon. -[Levee] Look here, Cutler!
translation.ja: バーボンだ 見ろ カトラー

translation.en: -[in sing-song] I got me some shoes. -[Slow Drag] Ooh!
translation.ja: カッコいい靴を買ったぞ

translation.en: Nigga, I ain't studying you.
translation.ja: どうでもいいさ

translation.en: [Toledo] How much you pay for something like that, Levee?
translation.ja: いくらだった？

translation.en: Eleven dollars. Four dollars of it belong to Cutler.
translation.ja: 11ドル ４ドルはカトラーの金だ

translation.en: Ooh! Levee say if it wasn't for Cutler, he wouldn't have no new shoes.
translation.ja: じゃあカトラーのおかげか

translation.en: I ain't thinking about Levee or his shoes. -[laughing] -[Cutler] Let's get ready to rehearse.
translation.ja: 俺には関係ないね さあ リハを始めよう

translation.en: [Slow Drag] I'm with you on that score. Don't want to be here all night.
translation.ja: ああ　さっさと帰りたい

translation.en: [Toledo] Ain't but four songs on the list. Last time there was six songs.
translation.ja: ４曲だけだ 前回は６曲やった

translation.en: Yeah. Now I'm ready.
translation.ja: よし　これで準備完了だ

translation.en: I can play some good music now.
translation.ja: 盛り上がるぞ

translation.en: Damn! They done changed things around. Don't never leave well enough alone.
translation.ja: 前はなかったドアだ 造りを変えたな

translation.en: Yeah, everything changing all the time. Even the air you breathing change.
translation.ja: 変化は世の常だ 空気も入れ替わる

translation.en: Yeah, you got, uh, monoxide, hydrogen, changing all the time.
translation.ja: 一酸化物やら水素やら 変わっていくし―

translation.en: Skin changing. Different molecules. Everything.
translation.ja: 肌の分子も生まれ変わってる

translation.en: Nigga, what is you talking about?
translation.ja: 何の話だ

translation.en: I'm talking about the room, I ain't talking about no skin and air.
translation.ja: 俺は部屋の話をしてる

translation.en: I'm talking about something I can see. I ain't talking about no molecules.
translation.ja: 分子なんか目に見えないだろ

translation.en: I know what you talking about. You don't know what I'm talking about.
translation.ja: お前には難しいか？

translation.en: That door. You see that door? That's what I'm talking about. Door wasn't there before.
translation.ja: 俺はドアの話をしてるんだ 前はなかった

translation.en: You wouldn't know your right from left. And damn if that door wasn't there.
translation.ja: お前の勘違いだ 部屋が違うんだ ドアがなかったわけじゃない

translation.en: If you talking about they done switched rooms, you right. But don't go telling me that door wasn't there.
translation.ja: 部屋が違うんだ ドアがなかったわけじゃない

translation.en: Damn the door and let's do this. I want to get out of here.
translation.ja: ドアより リハだ

translation.en: Toledo started all that about the door. I'm just saying that things change.
translation.ja: 俺はただ“物事は変わる”と

translation.en: What you think I was saying? Things change. The air and everything.
translation.ja: “変化は世の常”と 言ったのは俺だ

translation.en: Now you gonna say you was saying it. You gonna fit two propositions on the same track,
translation.ja: ２台の列車が 同じ線路を走ってて―

translation.en: run them into each other, and 'cause they crash, you gonna say it's the same train?
translation.ja: 正面衝突したら １台の列車になるか？

translation.en: -Now this nigga talking about trains. -[Cutler laughs]
translation.ja: 今度は列車の話かよ

translation.en: We done went from the air to the skin to the door and now trains.
translation.ja: 空気から始まり 肌 ドア そして列車だ

translation.en: Toledo, I'd just like to be inside your head for five minutes just to see how you think.
translation.ja: トレド　お前の頭に入って 中を見てみたいね

translation.en: You done got more shit piled up and mixed up in there -than the devil got sinners. -[laughing]
translation.ja: くだらんネタばかり 詰め込んでさ

translation.en: You been reading too many goddamn books.
translation.ja: 本の読みすぎだ

translation.en: What you care about how much I read?
translation.ja: 俺の勝手だろ

translation.en: I'm gonna ignore you 'cause you're ignorant.
translation.ja: お前は無知だ

translation.en: -Let's rehearse the music. -All right.
translation.ja: とにかくリハを

translation.en: You ain't gotta rehearse that.
translation.ja: やめとこう

translation.en: Ain't nothing but old jug-band music. They need one of them jug bands for this.
translation.ja: 古くさいジャグ･バンドの 音楽だ

translation.en: Don't make no difference to me, long as we get paid.
translation.ja: 金になればいい

translation.en: That ain't what I'm talking about. I'm talking about art.
translation.ja: 金より芸術だろ

translation.en: What's drawing got to do with it?
translation.ja: 絵に何の関係が？

translation.en: Where you get this nigga from, Cutler? He sound like one of them Alabama niggas.
translation.ja: スロー･ドラッグは アラバマの出か？

translation.en: It's Slow Drag, all right.
translation.ja: いいじゃないか

translation.en: Just play the piece, nigga.
translation.ja: 素直に従え

translation.en: If you want to be one of them, uh, what you call virtuosos or something, you're in the wrong place.
translation.ja: 音楽界の巨匠のつもりか？ 思い上がるな

translation.en: You ain't no King Oliver or Buddy Bolden.
translation.ja: キング･オリヴァーじゃない

translation.en: You're just an old trumpet player come a dime a dozen. Talking about art.
translation.ja: 平凡なトランペット吹きだろ 何が芸術だ

translation.en: What is you? I don't see your name in lights.
translation.ja: あんたもバックバンドだ

translation.en: I just play the piece. Whatever they want. I don't criticize other people's music.
translation.ja: だから俺は指示に従う

translation.en: I ain't like you, Cutler. I got talent.
translation.ja: 俺は違う　才能がある

translation.en: Me and this horn, we's tight.
translation.ja: 楽器との絆もな

translation.en: If my daddy had a knowed I was gonna turn out like this, he woulda named me Gabriel.
translation.ja: 大天使ガブリエルも顔負けさ

translation.en: I'm gonna get me a band and make me some records.
translation.ja: 自分のバンドを作るんだ

translation.en: I done give Mr. Sturdyvant some of my songs I wrote, and he say he gonna let me record them when I get my band together.
translation.ja: メルさんに曲を見せたら “レコードにする”と

translation.en: I just gotta finish the last part of this song.
translation.ja: もうすぐ完成だ

translation.en: I knows how to play real music, not this old jug-band shit. I got style.
translation.ja: ジャグ･バンドと違い 俺には個性がある

translation.en: Oh, everybody got style.
translation.ja: 誰にでもあるさ

translation.en: Style ain't nothing but keeping the same idea from beginning to end. Everybody got it.
translation.ja: 曲には個性が表れるものだ 誰にでもある

translation.en: Everybody can't play like I do. Everybody can't have their own band.
translation.ja: だが誰にでも バンドは持てない

translation.en: Until you get your own band where you can play what you want, play the piece and stop complaining.
translation.ja: 実際に持つまでは 言うことを聞け

translation.en: I told you when you came on here, this ain't none of them hot bands.
translation.ja: 俺たちは人気バンドじゃない

translation.en: This is an accompaniment band. You play Ma's music when you're here.
translation.ja: マ･レイニーの 伴奏をするバンドだ

translation.en: I got sense enough to know that. I could look at y'all and see what kind of band it is. I could look at Toledo and see what kind of band it is.
translation.ja: だよな　どんなバンドか トレドを見れば分かる

translation.en: Oh, now Toledo ain't said nothing to you. Don't get Toledo started now.
translation.ja: 俺は何も言ってない 怒らせるな

translation.en: Is you all gonna rehearse the music or ain't you?
translation.ja: リハしないのか？

translation.en: How many times you done play them songs?
translation.ja: 知り尽くした曲だ　必要ない

translation.en: -What you gotta rehearse for? -This a recording session.
translation.ja: 知り尽くした曲だ　必要ない 収録を一発で決めて帰りたい

translation.en: I want to get it right the first time and get on out of here.
translation.ja: 収録を一発で決めて帰りたい

translation.en: Well, y'all go on and rehearse, then. I'm going to finish this song for Mr. Sturdyvant.
translation.ja: 好きにしろ　俺は メルさんに渡す曲を仕上げる

translation.en: Levee, I don't want no shit. You rehearse like everybody else. You in the band just like everybody else.
translation.ja: バンドのメンバーだろ 一緒にリハをやれ

translation.en: Mr. Sturdyvant gonna have to wait. It's the band's time.
translation.ja: 今はバンドの時間だ

translation.en: I'm ready if you want to rehearse. I said there ain't no point in it.
translation.ja: いいけどさ マ･レイニーがいなきゃ 無意味だ

translation.en: Ma ain't here. What's the point?
translation.ja: マ･レイニーがいなきゃ 無意味だ

translation.en: "Ma Rainey's Black Bottom." One, two, you know what to do.
translation.ja: “ブラックボトム”だ ワン ツー　さあ 始めるぞ

translation.en: No, no, no. No, no. We ain't doing it that way.
translation.ja: 待て　アーヴィンさんの リストには―

translation.en: We doing my version. That's what Mr. Irvin told me. Say it's on the list he gave.
translation.ja: 俺のアレンジでと 書いてあるはず

translation.en: Let me worry about what's on the list.
translation.ja: 関係ない

translation.en: What sense it make to rehearse the wrong version?
translation.ja: これじゃ無駄だ

translation.en: You supposed to rehearse what you gonna play.
translation.ja: 収録用にリハしないと

translation.en: -That's the way they taught me. -That's what I'm trying to say.
translation.ja: 収録用にリハしないと そのとおり

translation.en: You trying to tell me what we is and ain't gonna play, and that ain't none of your business. Your business is to play what I say.
translation.ja: お前が決めることじゃない 指示に従え

translation.en: Oh. I see now. You done got jealous 'cause Mr. Irvin using my version.
translation.ja: 俺のアレンジが 選ばれたから嫉妬か

translation.en: [scoffs] What I got to be jealous of you about? The day I get jealous of you, I may as well lay down and die.
translation.ja: お前に嫉妬するくらいなら 死ぬよ

translation.en: Levee started all that 'cause he too lazy to rehearse.
translation.ja: レヴィーは怠けたいのさ

translation.en: Where's the paper? Look at the paper. See what it say. Gonna tell me I'm too lazy to rehearse.
translation.ja: リストを読めよ 書いてあるから

translation.en: [Cutler] We ain't talking about the paper. We talking about you understanding where you fit in here.
translation.ja: リストの話より 立場をわきまえて俺に従え

translation.en: -You play what I say. -I don't care what you play.
translation.ja: リストの話より 立場をわきまえて俺に従え もういい　アーヴィンさんに 聞けば分かる

translation.en: Mr. Irvin gonna straighten it up. I don't care what you play.
translation.ja: もういい　アーヴィンさんに 聞けば分かる

translation.en: You boys know what's keeping Ma?
translation.ja: マはどこかな

translation.en: Can't say, Mr. Irvin. She'll be along directly, I reckon.
translation.ja: ここに向かってるかと

translation.en: Well, you go ahead.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Mr. Irvin… [chuckles] About these songs…
translation.ja: アーヴィンさん 曲の確認です

translation.en: Whatever's on the list.
translation.ja: リストに

translation.en: I'm talking about this "Black Bottom."
translation.ja: “ブラックボトム”は…

translation.en: -It's on the list. -Yes, sir, I know it's on the list.
translation.ja: やる 曲は２パターンあります どっちを？

translation.en: But I just want to know which version. We got two versions of that song.
translation.ja: 曲は２パターンあります どっちを？

translation.en: Oh, Levee's version. We're using Levee's arrangement.
translation.ja: レヴィーのアレンジを使え

translation.en: [Cutler] Okay, got that straight. Now about this "Moonshine Blues."
translation.ja: そうですか “ムーンシャイン”は？

translation.en: Yeah, we'll work it out with Ma, Cutler. You boys just rehearse whatever's on that list.
translation.ja: マ･レイニーには説明する リハしておいてくれ

translation.en: See, I told you!
translation.ja: だから言ったんだ

translation.en: It don't mean nothing when I say it. You got to wait for Mr. Irvin to say it. I told you the way it is.
translation.ja: アーヴィンさんも 俺と同じことを言ったろ？

translation.en: The sooner you understand it ain't what you say, or what Mr. Irvin say, it's what Ma say that count.
translation.ja: 大事なのは彼じゃなく マ･レイニーの意見だ

translation.en: I don't care what you play. Don't matter to me. Mr. Irvin gonna straighten it up. I don't care what you play.
translation.ja: アーヴィンさんが話をつける 好きにリハしてろ

translation.en: Thank you. All right, let's, uh, play this "Hear Me Talking to You" till we figure out what's going on with this "Black Bottom."
translation.ja: “ヒア･ミー･トーキング･ トゥ･ユー”を先に

translation.en: One, two, you know what to do.
translation.ja: ワン ツー　さあ 始めるぞ

translation.en: Don't nobody say when it comes to Ma. She gonna do what she wanna do.
translation.ja: マ･レイニーは 絶対に自分を通す

translation.en: Mr. Irvin the one putting out the record.
translation.ja: レコードを出すのは…

translation.en: He gonna put out what she want him to put out.
translation.ja: マ･レイニーだ

translation.en: Levee confused about who the boss is. He don't know Ma's the boss.
translation.ja: ボスはマだってことさ

translation.en: You know how many records she sold in New York?
translation.ja: ＮＹで売れたか？

translation.en: And you know what's in New York? Harlem. Harlem's in New York.
translation.ja: ハーレムのある ニューヨークでさ

translation.en: [Slow Drag] So what if they didn't sell in New York? We packed them in in Memphis, Birmingham, Atlanta.
translation.ja: 南部では各地で満席になった

translation.en: We ain't in Memphis. We in Chicago. We in a recording session. Mr. Sturdyvant and Mr. Irvin say what's gonna be here.
translation.ja: ここはシカゴだ　決定権は アーヴィンさんたちにある

translation.en: You heard what the man told you. "Ma Rainey's Black Bottom." Levee's arrangement.
translation.ja: 俺のアレンジでやると 言われたのに―

translation.en: There you go. That's what he told you. I don't know why y'all want to pick with me about it.
translation.ja: なんでモメたがるのか 理解できない

translation.en: I'm with Slow Drag. Let's go and get it rehearsed.
translation.ja: 早くリハを… よし “ブラックボトム” レヴィーのアレンジだ

translation.en: All right, "Ma Rainey's Black Bottom," Levee's version.
translation.ja: よし “ブラックボトム” レヴィーのアレンジだ

translation.en: [Toledo] How that first part go again there, Lev?
translation.ja: 最初はどんな感じだ？

translation.en: It go like this.
translation.ja: こうだよ

translation.en: That's to get the people's attention.
translation.ja: 注目を引き―

translation.en: That's when you and Slow Drag come in with the rhythm, me and Cutler play on the breaks.
translation.ja: ２人がリズムを出し 金管が入る

translation.en: The man asked how the part go. Ain't ask for all that. "Ma Rainey's Black Bottom."
translation.ja: 全部 説明しなくていい やってみよう

translation.en: One, two, you know what to do.
translation.ja: ワン ツー　さあ 始めるぞ

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. Y'all gotta keep up now. You playing in the wrong time.
translation.ja: おいおい テンポが違う　ついてこいよ

translation.en: Will you let us play this song? We been playing before you was born. Trying to tell us how to play.
translation.ja: 俺たちはベテランだぞ 指図するな

translation.en: All right. Let's try again.
translation.ja: いいか もう一度

translation.en: Wait a minute. Let me fix this. This string starting to unravel,
translation.ja: カトラー　待て 弦を締めたい

translation.en: and you know I want to play Levee's music right.
translation.ja: ちゃんと弾くためにな

translation.en: If you was any kind of musician, you'd take care of your instrument. Keep it in tip-top order.
translation.ja: ミュージシャンなら 手入れしとけ

translation.en: If you was any kind of musician, I'd let you be in my band.
translation.ja: あんたが本物なら バンドに誘う

translation.en: -Shit. -Damn! Slow Drag, watch them big-ass shoes you got.
translation.ja: おい スロー･ドラッグ 気をつけろよ

translation.en: Ain't nobody done nothing to you.
translation.ja: 俺が何を？

translation.en: You done stepped on my shoes.
translation.ja: 足を踏んだ

translation.en: Then move them out the way. You was in my way. I wasn't in your way.
translation.ja: お前から近寄ってきたんだ

translation.en: Any man who takes a whole week's pay and puts it on some shoes, understand what I mean,
translation.ja: 奴は１週間の稼ぎを 靴につぎ込んだ

translation.en: what you walk around on the ground with, is a fool. And I don't mind telling him.
translation.ja: ただ歩くだけの物にバカだよ

translation.en: What difference it make to you?
translation.ja: ほっとけ

translation.en: Ain't nothing wrong with having nice shoes. -Look at Toledo. -[Levee] Ooh!
translation.ja: 靴にこだわってもいい トレドを見ろ

translation.en: What was that about Toledo?
translation.ja: 俺が何だ

translation.en: Nigga got them clodhoppers. Old brogans. He ain't nothing but a sharecropper.
translation.ja: くたびれたドタ靴か まさに小作人って感じだな

translation.en: Hey, Slow Drag.
translation.ja: スロー･ドラッグ

translation.en: Play something for me.
translation.ja: 弾いてくれ

translation.en: A man gotta have some shoes to dance like this.
translation.ja: 踊るには こんな靴が必要だ

translation.en: He can't dance like this with them clodhoppers Toledo got.
translation.ja: トレドのドタ靴じゃ踊れない

translation.en: That's the trouble with colored folks, always looking to have a good time.
translation.ja: 楽しもうとした黒人は―

translation.en: More niggas have got killed trying to have a good time than God got ways to count.
translation.ja: 大勢 殺されて 神も数えきれない

translation.en: What the hell having a good time mean? That's what I want to know.
translation.ja: そもそも“楽しむ”とは何だ

translation.en: Got to be more to life than just having a good time. If there ain't, then this is a piss-poor life we're living if that's all there is to be got out of it.
translation.ja: 大切なのは楽しむことか？ だったら人生は実にむなしい

translation.en: Niggas been having a good time before you was born, and they gonna keep having a good time after you gone.
translation.ja: 黒人は楽しんで生きてきたし 今後も楽しむ

translation.en: Nobody talking about making the lot for the colored man better for him here in America.
translation.ja: 黒人によりよい人生を もたらす方法や―

translation.en: Ain't nobody thinking about what kind of life, the world they gonna leave for the young'uns.
translation.ja: 子供にどんな世界を残すか 考えろ

translation.en: It's just, "Show me a good time. That's all I want." Aw. It just makes me sick.
translation.ja: 楽しければいいという姿勢に ヘドが出る

translation.en: Good times is what makes life worth living.
translation.ja: 楽しいから生きられる

translation.en: Hey, I know how to have a good time as well as the next man.
translation.ja: こんなことくらい 俺にもできる

translation.en: I just said there's got to be more to life than just having a good time.
translation.ja: だが それだけじゃ ダメだってことだ

translation.en: I said, the colored man ought to be doing more than trying to have a good time all the time.
translation.ja: 楽しさ以上の何かを 求めるべきだ

translation.en: Well, what is you doing, nigga?
translation.ja: あんたは何を？

translation.en: You're talking all them highfalutin ideas about making a better world for the colored man. What is you doing to make it better?
translation.ja: ご立派な理想はともかく 具体的には何をしてる？

translation.en: You playing the music and looking for your next piece of pussy same as we is. What is you doing?
translation.ja: 演奏して女をあさる日々だ 俺たちと同じだろ

translation.en: It ain't just me, fool. I said everybody.
translation.ja: 俺じゃなく みんなの問題だ

translation.en: You think I'm gonna solve the colored man's problem all by myself?
translation.ja: 黒人全体の問題を 俺に丸投げするな

translation.en: I said "we." You understand that?
translation.ja: 黒人全体の問題を 俺に丸投げするな “我々”で解決すべきだろ

translation.en: We? That's every living colored man in the world
translation.ja: “我々”で解決すべきだろ 世界中の黒人が それぞれ役割を果たすんだ

translation.en: got to do his share, got to do his part.
translation.ja: 世界中の黒人が それぞれ役割を果たすんだ

translation.en: I ain't talking about what I'm gonna do or you gonna do, or Cutler, Slow Drag, anybody else.
translation.ja: 誰が個別に何をするかという 話じゃない

translation.en: I'm talking about what all of us gonna do together.
translation.ja: 全員で一緒に 何をするかが大切なんだ

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about, nigga.
translation.ja: そういう話だ

translation.en: Well, why ain't you just say that then?
translation.ja: 最初からそう言え

translation.en: Toledo, I don't know why you waste your time with this fool.
translation.ja: トレド　バカに関わるな

translation.en: I ain't gonna be too many more of your fools.
translation.ja: バカじゃない

translation.en: Ain't nobody studying you.
translation.ja: そうかよ

translation.en: All right, I ain't nobody. Don't pay me no mind.
translation.ja: 俺は無視してくれ

translation.en: Ain't nobody but the devil.
translation.ja: 悪魔め

translation.en: There you go. That's who I am. I'm the devil. I ain't nothing but the devil.
translation.ja: そうとも 俺は悪魔そのものだ

translation.en: -I know a man sold his soul to the devil. -[all groan]
translation.ja: 魂を売った男を？

translation.en: Name of Eliza Cotter. Lived in Tuscaloosa County, Alabama.
translation.ja: アラバマの イライザ･コッターが―

translation.en: Devil came by and he upped and sold him his soul.
translation.ja: 悪魔に魂を売った

translation.en: Nigga, how you know this man done sold his soul to the devil? You talking some old-woman foolishness.
translation.ja: 何を言い出す？ まるでバアさんの与太話だ

translation.en: Everybody know. It wasn't no secret. He went around working for the devil and everybody knowed it.
translation.ja: 有名な話だ 奴は悪魔のしもべになった

translation.en: Carried him a bag. One of them carpet bags.
translation.ja: カバンは カーペットバッグで―

translation.en: Folks say he carried the devil's papers and whatnot where he put your fingerprint on the paper with blood.
translation.ja: 悪魔との契約書には 血判を押したらしい

translation.en: Where he at now? That's what I want to know. He can have my whole handprint if he want to.
translation.ja: そいつはどこだ？ 俺も手形を押すぞ

translation.en: Showed up one day all fancied out in the finest clothes you ever seen on a colored man.
translation.ja: 黒人では珍しいほど 高級な服を着て―

translation.en: Pocketful of money, just living the life of a rich man.
translation.ja: うなるほどの金を持ち―

translation.en: Had him a string of women he run around with and throw his money away on.
translation.ja: 女を何人も引き連れ 豪遊してた

translation.en: One of the fellas of them gals he was messing with got fixed on him wrong and Eliza killed him.
translation.ja: ある時 彼は 女たちの恋人の１人を殺し

translation.en: And laughed about it.
translation.ja: 笑い飛ばした

translation.en: Sheriff come and arrest him and let him go.
translation.ja: 逮捕後 すぐ保釈され―

translation.en: Trial come up. Judge cut him loose. Cut him loose -and give him a bottle of whiskey. -[Cutler whistles]
translation.ja: 裁判で無罪放免 ウイスキーまでもらった

translation.en: Folks ask what done happened to make him change, and he tell them straight-out he done sold his soul to the devil
translation.ja: “悪魔に魂を売った恩恵だ” と彼は言ったそうだ

translation.en: and asked them if they wanted to sell theirs, too, 'cause he could arrange it for them.
translation.ja: “売りたい奴がいたら 手配する”と

translation.en: Hold on. What happened to this fella? That's what I want to know.
translation.ja: そいつは結局どうなった？

translation.en: Last I heard, he headed up north with that bag of his,
translation.ja: 北に向かったらしい

translation.en: handing out $100 bills on the spot to whoever wanted to sign on with the devil.
translation.ja: 悪魔と契約する奴に 金を配りながらな

translation.en: Hmm. I sure wish I knew where he went. He wouldn't have to convince me long. Hell, I'd even help him sign people up.
translation.ja: 居場所が分かれば 俺も仲間になるのに

translation.en: Nigga, God gonna strike you down with that blasphemy you talking.
translation.ja: 神への冒とくだ 雷で打たれるぞ

translation.en: Oh, shit. God don't mean nothing to me.
translation.ja: 神なんか怖くないね

translation.en: Let him strike me. Here I am, standing right here.
translation.ja: 打つなら打つがいい

translation.en: What you talking about he gonna strike me?
translation.ja: 何が雷だ

translation.en: Here I am. Let him strike me. I ain't scared of him.
translation.ja: 俺はここだ　打ってみろ

translation.en: All right. You gonna be sorry. You gonna fix yourself to have bad luck. Ain't nothing gonna work out for you.
translation.ja: 不幸に見舞われ 実りのない人生になるぞ

translation.en: -Bad luck? -Yeah. What I care about bad luck?
translation.ja: 不幸？ 俺が気にするとでも？

translation.en: You talking simple.
translation.ja: 単純だな

translation.en: I ain't had nothing but bad luck all my life.
translation.ja: 俺は不幸しか知らない

translation.en: Couldn't get no worse. What the hell I care about bad luck?
translation.ja: 俺は不幸しか知らない 全く怖くないね 慣れっこなんだ

translation.en: I eat it every day for breakfast.
translation.ja: 全く怖くないね 慣れっこなんだ

translation.en: You dumber than I thought you was, talking about bad luck.
translation.ja: あんた 意外とマヌケだな

translation.en: All right, nigga.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: You'll see. [chuckles]
translation.ja: まあ見てろ

translation.en: Can't tell a fool nothing.
translation.ja: バカな奴だ

translation.en: You'll see.
translation.ja: 今に分かる

translation.en: Oh. There you go.
translation.ja: ああ あそこよ

translation.en: Over there.
translation.ja: ほら

translation.en: Cutler, your boys' sandwiches are here.
translation.ja: カトラー　サンドイッチだぞ

translation.en: -Cutler? -[policeman] Lady--
translation.ja: カトラー

translation.en: -[Ma Rainey] This is a brand new car. -Lady-- Ain't had but a ding. -Okay, lady-- -[Ma Rainey] What you gonna do?
translation.ja: ピカピカの新車だったのに どうしてくれるんだい

translation.en: -Ma! -[policeman] I'm talking--
translation.ja: マ･レイニー！

translation.en: [Ma Rainey] I got eyes, you got eyes. What are you gonna do?
translation.ja: マ どうした？

translation.en: Tell this man who I am. Get him straight. Tell this man who he's messing with.
translation.ja: その男に 私が誰か教えてやりな

translation.en: Officer, what's the matter? What's the problem?
translation.ja: お巡りさん　何が？

translation.en: When I walked up on the incident, this lady--
translation.ja: 私が着いたら…

translation.en: -Sylvester wrecked Ma's car. -I… I did not. The man hit me.
translation.ja: シルヴェスターが… 俺じゃない

translation.en: [policeman] You want it in a nutshell? We got her charged with assault and battery.
translation.ja: 彼女は暴行罪になります

translation.en: -Assault and what for what? -Sylvester was driving--
translation.ja: 暴行罪？

translation.en: I can tell you what happened if you wanna know. That's my nephew. That's Sylvester. He was driving my car--
translation.ja: いいかい 甥(おい)が私の車を運転してて…

translation.en: -We don't know whose car it is. -That's Ma's car.
translation.ja: あなたの車？ 私が買った車だ

translation.en: I bought and paid for that car.
translation.ja: 私が買った車だ

translation.en: That's what you say. We gotta check it out.
translation.ja: 調べないと

translation.en: What's the problem?
translation.ja: 何事だ

translation.en: I was calling the paddy wagon to haul them to the station, sort everything out.
translation.ja: 私がパトカーを呼んだら 彼女が怒り始めて…

translation.en: -She's aggressive with the other driver-- -He got ugly with me.
translation.ja: 私がパトカーを呼んだら 彼女が怒り始めて… ウソつくな

translation.en: -I don't know why you tell that lie. -You let me tell the story?
translation.ja: ウソつくな 話の途中だ

translation.en: Well, if you gonna tell it, tell it right.
translation.ja: 正確に話してよ

translation.en: Like I said, while I was waiting for the paddy wagon,
translation.ja: いいか 私はパトカーを呼んだ

translation.en: I turn to hear this guy's side of the story. She won't let him get a word in edgeways.
translation.ja: 彼女は 事故の相手の 言葉を遮り―

translation.en: He steps in front of her to tell his version of things, she pushes him to the ground.
translation.ja: 一歩前に出た彼を突き倒した

translation.en: She ain't hit him. He just fell.
translation.ja: 転んだの

translation.en: If that don't beat all to hell. I ain't touched the man.
translation.ja: 私は何もしてない

translation.en: All right, Ma. Officer, can I speak to you for a minute?
translation.ja: お巡りさん　こちらへ

translation.en: I got things to do. He bumped into me and fell down. Flopping on the ground like a rag doll.
translation.ja: 奴からぶつかってきて 勝手に倒れたんだよ

translation.en: I ain't touch the man.
translation.ja: 手は出してない

translation.en: [Irvin] All right, Ma.
translation.ja: さあ マ

translation.en: Come on. Let's go. Move it out.
translation.ja: 皆 解散だ

translation.en: I got it all taken care of.
translation.ja: もう大丈夫

translation.en: Clear it out. Come on. Let's go.
translation.ja: さあ 散って

translation.en: What's going on? What did you do?
translation.ja: 一体 何が？

translation.en: Sturdyvant, get on away from me. That's the last thing I need, to go through your shit.
translation.ja: あんたの相手はしたくない

translation.en: -[policeman] Everybody move along. -It's not the place.
translation.ja: メル　やめてくれ

translation.en: Here, Ma.
translation.ja: マ･レイニー

translation.en: Let me take your things.
translation.ja: 荷物を

translation.en: -I don't believe we've met. -Hi.
translation.ja: 初対面かな

translation.en: That's my nephew Sylvester, and that there's Dussie Mae.
translation.ja: 甥とダシー･メイだよ

translation.en: -Oh, hello. -[Ma Rainey] Everybody here?
translation.ja: どうも バンドは？

translation.en: They're in the band room.
translation.ja: リハ室だ マ･レイニー そこに…

translation.en: -Ma, why don't you sit and relax? -I ain't for no sitting.
translation.ja: リハ室だ マ･レイニー そこに… 結構だ

translation.en: -Where's the bathroom? -Uh, down that hall.
translation.ja: トイレは？ 廊下の先だ

translation.en: Honey, call down there and see about my car. I need my car fixed today.
translation.ja: 車が今日中に直るか確認して

translation.en: Why y'all keep it so hot in here? Y'all want to make records, better get a fan on.
translation.ja: 暑い部屋だね 扇風機を運んで

translation.en: I got it, Ma. I'll take care of everything.
translation.ja: 了解　仰せのままに

translation.en: [Mel] She's late and already--
translation.ja: 遅刻のうえ…

translation.en: I talked to her last night. Got everything straight. You stay out of the way. Let me handle it.
translation.ja: ゆうべ 彼女と話したから 心配しなくていい

translation.en: You handled it last time, remember?
translation.ja: 前回 彼女は 誰より偉そうに現れ―

translation.en: She marches in like she owns the place, complains about the building being cold,
translation.ja: 前回 彼女は 誰より偉そうに現れ― コードで転んで 私を訴えると脅した

translation.en: trips over a mic wire, then threatens to sue me.
translation.ja: コードで転んで 私を訴えると脅した

translation.en: I ain't never been in a recording studio.
translation.ja: スタジオに来たのは初めて

translation.en: Where the band at?
translation.ja: バンドは？

translation.en: They off somewhere rehearsing.
translation.ja: リハ中だよ

translation.en: Come over here and let me see that dress.
translation.ja: 服を見せて

translation.en: That dress look nice.
translation.ja: 似合ってる

translation.en: I'm gonna take you tomorrow to get you some things before I take you down to Memphis.
translation.ja: メンフィスに向かう前に 買い物しよう

translation.en: They got some clothes up here they ain't got in Memphis.
translation.ja: シカゴには いい店がある

translation.en: -I want you to look nice for me, hmm? -Mmm-hmm. You gonna travel with the show, you gotta look nice.
translation.ja: きれいでいてよ ツアーして回るんだからさ

translation.en: I just need me some new shoes. These hurt my feet.
translation.ja: なら靴を　これは痛いの

translation.en: Oh, don't you be messing around with no shoes that pinch your feet.
translation.ja: 痛い靴を履いちゃダメだ

translation.en: Ma knows something about bad feet. Mmm.
translation.ja: 足が痛むつらさはよく分かる

translation.en: Go on, get my slippers out my bag over yonder.
translation.ja: スリッパを出しとくれ

translation.en: [sighs] I just want some of them yellow ones. About a half size bigger.
translation.ja: 黄色い靴がいいな 少し大きいサイズでね

translation.en: We'll get you whatever you need. Sylvester too.
translation.ja: ２人とも 何でも買いな

translation.en: Sylvester, tuck your clothes in. Straighten them up and look nice. Like a gentleman.
translation.ja: シルヴェスター シャツが出てるよ

translation.en: Look at Sylvester with that hat on.
translation.ja: 室内で帽子？

translation.en: [Ma Rainey] Take that hat off inside. Come over here and leave that piano.
translation.ja: 脱ぎな　ピアノはほっといて

translation.en: [stammering] I ain't doing nothing to the… piano. I'm… l… looking at it.
translation.ja: ピアノを見… 見てただけ

translation.en: Baby, come over here and sit down. Come on.
translation.ja: ベイビー　こっちにおいで

translation.en: Soon as Mr. Irvin come back, I'm gonna have him take you down, introduce you to the band.
translation.ja: アーヴィンが戻ったら バンドに紹介させる

translation.en: Cutler gonna show you how your part go.
translation.ja: 曲の口上を習って―

translation.en: When you get your money, send some of it home to your mama.
translation.ja: 報酬の一部は お母さんに送ってあげな

translation.en: -Let her know you're doing all right. -Okay.
translation.ja: 報酬の一部は お母さんに送ってあげな 分かった

translation.en: Ma, I called down to the garage and checked on your car.
translation.ja: マ･レイニー　車の件を 修理工場に確認したよ

translation.en: It's just a scratch, and they'll have it ready for you this afternoon.
translation.ja: かすり傷だから 午後のうちに直して―

translation.en: They'll send it over with one of their fellows.
translation.ja: 届けるってさ

translation.en: Better have my car fixed right. I ain't going for that. Brand-new car. They better fix it like new.
translation.ja: 新車だったんだ 新車同然にしてほしいね

translation.en: Irvin, what is that I hear?
translation.ja: アーヴィン　あれは？

translation.en: I know they ain't rehearsing Levee's "Black Bottom." I know I ain't hearing that.
translation.ja: あんなの私の曲じゃない

translation.en: Ma, it's what I wanted to talk to you about. Levee's version, it really picks it up.
translation.ja: レヴィーのアレンジが すごくいいんだ

translation.en: I ain't studying Levee nothing. I know what he done to that song.
translation.ja: 知るもんか あのアレンジで 歌う気はないよ

translation.en: I don't like to sing it that way. I'm doing it the old way.
translation.ja: あのアレンジで 歌う気はないよ

translation.en: That's why I brought my nephew in here to do the voice intro.
translation.ja: 甥が冒頭の口上をやる

translation.en: That's what people want now, Ma. They want something they can dance to.
translation.ja: 最近は踊れる曲が人気なんだ

translation.en: Levee's arrangement gives the people what they want. It makes them excited, forget about their troubles.
translation.ja: みんなで盛り上がり 嫌なことを忘れられる

translation.en: I don't care what you say, honey. Levee ain't messing up my song.
translation.ja: 何と言われても 奴の勝手にはさせない

translation.en: If he got what the people want, let him take it somewhere else. I'm singing Ma Rainey's song, not Levee's song.
translation.ja: あんなのがいいなら 他の歌手とやりな

translation.en: Now that's all there is to it.
translation.ja: 私は私の曲を歌う

translation.en: Carry my nephew on down there. Introduce him to the band.
translation.ja: 甥をバンドに紹介して

translation.en: I promised my sister I'd look out for him, so he's gonna do the voice intro to the song my way.
translation.ja: この子の面倒を見ると 妹に約束したんだ

translation.en: [Irvin] We just figured--
translation.ja: 我々…

translation.en: Who's this "we"? What you mean "we"? Come talking this "we" stuff. Who "we"?
translation.ja: “我々”って？ 突然 誰の話を始めるんだ

translation.en: Me and Sturdyvant. We decided--
translation.ja: 私とメルが…

translation.en: You decided, huh? I'm just a bump on a log.
translation.ja: 命令を？ 私は川に流されるだけの 木切れだとでも？

translation.en: I'm just gonna go whichever way the river drift. Is that it? You and Sturdyvant decided?
translation.ja: 私は川に流されるだけの 木切れだとでも？

translation.en: -No. We just thought-- -I ain't got no good sense.
translation.ja: ただ… 私には音楽のセンスがなく ファンの心も分からない？

translation.en: I know nothing about music or what a good song is or what ain't. You know more about my fans than I do.
translation.ja: 私には音楽のセンスがなく ファンの心も分からない？

translation.en: It's not that. It's more of what the people want.
translation.ja: 人々の要望に応えたいんだ

translation.en: Tell you something, Irvin, and you can go up there and you can tell Sturdyvant too.
translation.ja: アーヴィン メルにも伝えるんだ

translation.en: What you all say don't count with me, you understand?
translation.ja: 私は あんたらじゃなく―

translation.en: Ma listen to her heart. Ma listen to the voice inside her. That's what count with Ma.
translation.ja: 自分の中から聞こえる声に 耳を傾ける

translation.en: Carry my nephew on down there. Tell Cutler he'll do the voice intro to the "Black Bottom" song.
translation.ja: カトラーから甥に 口上を教えさせて

translation.en: Levee ain't messing up my song.
translation.ja: 元の曲をやる

translation.en: If that don't set right with you and Sturdyvant,
translation.ja: 断るなら―

translation.en: I can carry my black bottom on back down South to my tour, 'cause I don't like it up here noways.
translation.ja: 私は喜んで 南部のツアーに戻るだけだ

translation.en: Okay, Ma. I don't care.
translation.ja: 分かった マ･レイニー 私はどっちでもいい

translation.en: -I just thought-- -Damn what you thought!
translation.ja: ただ… しつこい！

translation.en: What you look like trying to tell me how to sing my song. That Levee and Sturdyvant shit, I ain't going for it.
translation.ja: 私の歌だ　レヴィーの アレンジではやらない

translation.en: Sylvester, go introduce yourself. I'm through playing with Irvin.
translation.ja: シルヴェスター バンドに会いなさい

translation.en: Uh… Where I go? Which way they at?
translation.ja: どこにいるの？

translation.en: Come on. I'll carry you down there myself.
translation.ja: 私が案内する

translation.en: Can I go? I want to see the band.
translation.ja: 私も行く

translation.en: No. Come on, Sylvester.
translation.ja: ダメだ シルヴェスター

translation.en: Okay, Ma. Have it your way, but we'll be ready to go in 15 minutes.
translation.ja: 好きにしていいが 15分後に始めるからね

translation.en: We'll be ready to go when Madam says so. That's the way it go around here.
translation.ja: 私が始めると言った時 始める

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.ja: やれやれ

translation.en: Cutler, this here my nephew Sylvester.
translation.ja: カトラー “ブラックボトム”は 元に戻し 甥が口上を

translation.en: He'll do the voice intro on "Black Bottom" using the old version.
translation.ja: “ブラックボトム”は 元に戻し 甥が口上を

translation.en: What? Mr. Irvin said we're using my version.
translation.ja: アーヴィンさんが…

translation.en: I ain't studying you or Mr. Irvin.
translation.ja: 彼は関係ない

translation.en: Cutler, get him straightened out on how to do his part. I ain't thinking about Levee. These folks done messed with the wrong person.
translation.ja: カトラー　甥に口上を教えて レヴィーは無視しな

translation.en: Cutler gonna teach you how to do your part. Go ahead and get it straight. Don't worry about what nobody else say.
translation.ja: しっかり練習するんだ 人の目は気にしなくていい

translation.en: Hey, come on in, boy. I'm Cutler. [chuckles]
translation.ja: やあ カトラーだ

translation.en: That's Toledo, Levee, and Slow Drag over there.
translation.ja: トレド　レヴィー スロー･ドラッグだ

translation.en: -Sylvester, huh? -Sylvester Brown.
translation.ja: シルヴェスターか はい

translation.en: I wrote a version of that song, what picks it up and sets it down in the people's lap,
translation.ja: 絶対 人気が出るアレンジを 作ったのに―

translation.en: and here she come talking this.
translation.ja: あの言いぐさだ

translation.en: You don't need that old circus bullshit. I know what I'm talking about. You gonna mess up the song, Cutler, and you know it.
translation.ja: 時代遅れなこだわりで 曲を台なしにするのか？

translation.en: I ain't gonna mess up nothing. Ma say--
translation.ja: マの考えでは…

translation.en: I don't care what Ma say!
translation.ja: くだらない！

translation.en: I'm talking about what the intro gonna do to the song.
translation.ja: イントロがカギだ

translation.en: The peoples in the North ain't gonna go for that old tent-show nonsense. -They wanna hear some music. -[Cutler] Nigga.
translation.ja: テントショーの音楽は 北部じゃウケない

translation.en: I done told you time and again. Ma say what to play, not you. You ain't here to be doing no creating. You play whatever Ma say.
translation.ja: 決めるのはマ･レイニーだ お前は黙って演奏すればいい

translation.en: I might not play nothing. I might just quit.
translation.ja: だったら いっそ辞める

translation.en: Nigga, don't nobody care if you quit. Whose heart you gonna break?
translation.ja: 脅してるつもりか？

translation.en: Levee ain't gonna quit. He need to make money to keep him in shoe polish.
translation.ja: 辞めないさ　靴磨き代が要る

translation.en: I done told y'all you don't know me. You don't know what I'll do.
translation.ja: あんたらは俺を知らない

translation.en: I don't think nobody give a damn. Sylvester, look here.
translation.ja: まあいい シルヴェスター

translation.en: The band plays the intro, and then you say,
translation.ja: イントロが出たら―

translation.en: "All right, boys, you done seen the rest."
translation.ja: “皆さん” “耳の肥えた皆さんも 驚くはず”

translation.en: "Now I'm gonna show you the best."
translation.ja: “耳の肥えた皆さんも 驚くはず”

translation.en: "Ma Rainey's gonna show you her black bottom."
translation.ja: “マ･レイニーの ブラックボトム”

translation.en: You got that? Heh. All right, let me hear you do it one time.
translation.ja: 分かったな？　言ってみろ

translation.en: All right, boys, you done s… s… [stuttering]
translation.ja: 皆さん　耳…

translation.en: …seen the rest.
translation.ja: 耳の肥えた…

translation.en: Now I'm gonna show you the best.
translation.ja: 皆さんも驚くはず

translation.en: Ma Rainey's gonna show you her black b… b… b…
translation.ja: マ･レイニーのブラックボ…

translation.en: …bottom.
translation.ja: ボトム

translation.en: [scoffs] All right, Cutler. Let me see you fix that.
translation.ja: なあ カトラー どう指導する？ お手並み拝見だ

translation.en: Straighten that out.
translation.ja: どう指導する？ お手並み拝見だ

translation.en: Slow Drag, whoo, you hear this shit?
translation.ja: スロー･ドラッグ 聞いたか？

translation.en: How in the hell the boy gonna do the part if he can't even talk?
translation.ja: ろくに話せないのに口上？

translation.en: [stuttering] Who… Who's you to tell me what to do, nigga?
translation.ja: え… 偉そうに何だよ

translation.en: This ain't your band. Ma tell me to d… do it, I'mma do it.
translation.ja: マ･レイニーの し… 指示だ ちゃんとやる

translation.en: So you can go to hell… n… n… nigga.
translation.ja: 地獄に落ちろ こ… この野郎

translation.en: [mockingly] B… Boy, ain't nobody studying you. Cutler, go on and fix that.
translation.ja: お… おい　どうでもいいさ カトラー　奴を指導できたら あんたの靴を磨いてやる

translation.en: You fix that and I'll shine your shoes for you. Go on and fix that one.
translation.ja: カトラー　奴を指導できたら あんたの靴を磨いてやる

translation.en: You say, uh, you Ma's nephew?
translation.ja: お前は マ･レイニーの甥だって？

translation.en: Yeah, so what that mean?
translation.ja: だから？

translation.en: Oh, I ain't meant nothing. I was just asking.
translation.ja: ただ聞いただけだよ

translation.en: Let's rehearse so the boy can get it right.
translation.ja: リハだ　練習しよう

translation.en: I ain't rehearsing nothing.
translation.ja: やなこった

translation.en: Just wait till I get my band together. I'm gonna record that song and show you how it's supposed to go.
translation.ja: じきバンドを組み 手本を見せてやる

translation.en: We can do it without Levee. Sylvester, you remember your part?
translation.ja: 勝手にしろ 口上は？

translation.en: Yeah, I… I remember pretty g… good.
translation.ja: ちゃんと お…  覚えてる

translation.en: Well, come on. Let's do it then. All right?
translation.ja: じゃあ 始めよう

translation.en: Levee.
translation.ja: レヴィー

translation.en: Good, you boys are rehearsing, I see.
translation.ja: リハをしてるな

translation.en: Yessir, we rehearsing. We know them songs real good.
translation.ja: ええ リハ中です 順調ですよ

translation.en: Good. Say, Levee, did you finish that song?
translation.ja: 例の曲は仕上がったか？

translation.en: Yessir, Mr. Sturdyvant. I got it right here.
translation.ja: ええ ここです

translation.en: I wrote that other part just like you say. It go like…
translation.ja: あなたのご提案どおりに…

translation.en: Then I wrote that part for the other people to dance, like you say, for them to forget about their troubles.
translation.ja: 踊ってスカッとするパートも

translation.en: Good. I'll see about your songs as soon as I get the chance.
translation.ja: 機会を見て検討するよ まず預かる

translation.en: -I'll just take this. -Yessir, Mr. Sturdyvant.
translation.ja: 機会を見て検討するよ まず預かる 了解しました(イエッサー) よろしくお願いします

translation.en: Soon as you get the chance.
translation.ja: 了解しました(イエッサー) よろしくお願いします

translation.en: [Cutler] You hear Levee? You hear this nigga? "Yessir, we's rehearsing, boss."
translation.ja: 聞いたか？ “イエッサー”だとさ

translation.en: I heard him. Seen him too. Shuffling them feet.
translation.ja: 足をモソモソ動かしてた

translation.en: [Toledo] Yeah, well, Levee can't help it none.
translation.ja: どうしようもないな

translation.en: He's spooked up by the white man. Ain't had time to study 'em.
translation.ja: 白人をよく知らないから 怖いのさ

translation.en: I studies the white man, I got him studied good.
translation.ja: 十分 知ってるとも

translation.en: The first time one fixes on me wrong, I'm gonna show him just how much I study.
translation.ja: 甘く見られたら思い知らせる

translation.en: Come tell me I'm spooked up by the white man. You let one mess with me, I'll show you how spooked up I am.
translation.ja: 俺を軽んじる奴には 目にモノ見せてやるさ

translation.en: The man come in here, call you a boy,
translation.ja: 軽んじられてるのに―

translation.en: tell you to get up off your ass and rehearse, and you ain't had nothing to say except, "Yessir!"
translation.ja: お前はすっ飛んでいって “イエッサー”と

translation.en: I can say "yessir" to whoever I please. What you got to do with it?
translation.ja: “イエッサー”と 言ってもいいだろ

translation.en: I know how to handle white folks. I been handling them for 32 years. You gonna tell me how to do it?
translation.ja: 白人との付き合い方は 32年 学んできた

translation.en: Just 'cause I say "yessir," don't mean I'm spooked up by him. I know what I'm doing. Let me handle him my way.
translation.ja: 俺なりの考えで “イエッサー”と言ってる

translation.en: [Cutler] Well, go and handle it then.
translation.ja: 勝手にしろ

translation.en: Toledo, you always messing with somebody. Always agitating somebody with that old philosophy bullshit.
translation.ja: トレド　あんたはいつも 哲学者ぶって人をあおる

translation.en: You stay out of my way about what I do and say. I'm my own person. Just let me alone.
translation.ja: だが考えがあるんだ ほっといてくれ

translation.en: All right, all right. Levee, you right. I apologize.
translation.ja: お前の言うとおりだ レヴィー　謝るよ

translation.en: Ain't none of my business you spooked up by the white man.
translation.ja: 白人を怖がってもいい

translation.en: -[all laughing] -See, that's the shit I'm talking about. Y'all back up and leave Levee alone.
translation.ja: うるさい ほっとけと言ってるだろ

translation.en: Oh, come on, Levee. We was all just having fun.
translation.ja: レヴィー　ただの冗談だ

translation.en: Toledo ain't said nothing about you he ain't said about me. You just taking it all wrong.
translation.ja: トレドは誰にでもこの調子だ

translation.en: I ain't meant nothing by it.
translation.ja: 怒るなよ

translation.en: Levee got to be Levee! He don't need nobody messing with him about the white man!
translation.ja: 俺は俺だ　白人のことで からかう奴は許さない

translation.en: 'Cause you don't know nothing about me. You don't know Levee.
translation.ja: あんたらは俺を知らない

translation.en: You don't know nothing about what kind of blood I got! What kind of a heart I got beating here!
translation.ja: 俺にどんな血が流れてるか 知らないだろ

translation.en: I was eight years old
translation.ja: ８歳の時―

translation.en: when a gang of white mans come into my daddy's house and have to do with my mama any way they want.
translation.ja: 白人の集団が家に来て 母に乱暴した

translation.en: We was living in Jefferson County, about eight miles outside of Natchez.
translation.ja: ナチズから 13キロほどの村に住んでた

translation.en: My daddy's name was Memphis. Memphis Lee Green.
translation.ja: 親父の名前は メンフィス･グリーン

translation.en: Had him near 50 acres of good farming land. I'm talking good land.
translation.ja: 50エーカーもの広さの いい畑を持ってた

translation.en: Grow anything you want.
translation.ja: 何でも育った

translation.en: He done gone off of shares and bought this land from Mr. Hallie's widow woman after he done passed on.
translation.ja: 死んだハリーさんの 土地を買ったんだ

translation.en: Folks called him a uppity nigger 'cause he done saved and borrowed to where he could buy this land and be independent.
translation.ja: 雇われの身から独立して 身の程知らずと言われたよ

translation.en: It was coming on planting time,
translation.ja: 作付けの時期で―

translation.en: and my daddy went into Natchez to get him some seed and fertilizer.
translation.ja: 親父は 種や肥料を買いに ナチズへ行った

translation.en: Called me, say, "Levee, you the man of the house now."
translation.ja: 親父は 種や肥料を買いに ナチズへ行った 俺に“お前は男だ”

translation.en: "Take care of your mama while I'm gone."
translation.ja: “ママを頼んだぞ”と

translation.en: I wasn't but a little boy.
translation.ja: とはいえ俺は―

translation.en: Eight years old.
translation.ja: ８歳だった

translation.en: My mama… was frying up some chicken when them mans come in the house.
translation.ja: お袋がチキンを揚げてた時 連中が家に来た

translation.en: Must have been eight or nine of 'em.
She's standing there frying that chicken when them mans come and took a hold of her
translation.ja: チキンを揚げてたお袋を 押さえ込んだ

translation.en: just like you take hold of a mule and make it do what you want.
translation.ja: チキンを揚げてたお袋を 押さえ込んだ ラバでも 押さえるかのように…

translation.en: There was my mama…
translation.ja: お袋は―

translation.en: with a gang of white mans.
translation.ja: 白人集団に…

translation.en: She tried to fight 'em off.
translation.ja: お袋は抵抗したが―

translation.en: I could see where it wasn't gonna do her any good.
translation.ja: どうにもならなかった

translation.en: I didn't know what they was doing to her, but I figured whatever it was, they might as well do to me too.
translation.ja: 状況はのみ込めなかったが 俺も襲われると思った

translation.en: My daddy had a knife he kept around there for hunting and working and whatnot.
translation.ja: それで親父が狩りや農作業に 使うナイフを―

translation.en: And I knew where he kept it. I went and got it.
translation.ja: それで親父が狩りや農作業に 使うナイフを― 取ってきた

translation.en: I'm gonna show you how spooked up I was by the white man.
translation.ja: 教えてやろうか？ いかに俺が 白人におびえてたか

translation.en: I tried my damnedest to cut one of them's throat.
translation.ja: 俺は奴らのノドを 裂きに行った

translation.en: I hit him on the shoulder.
translation.ja: だが肩に当たり―

translation.en: He reached back, grabbed hold of that knife, and whacked me across the chest with it.
translation.ja: ナイフを奪われ 逆に胸を切られた

translation.en: That's what made them stop.
translation.ja: 連中は手を止めた

translation.en: They was scared I was gonna bleed to death.
translation.ja: 俺が死ぬと思ったのさ

translation.en: My mama wrapped me in a blanket, carried me two miles down to the Furlow place
translation.ja: お袋は俺を抱いて３キロ先の ファーローさんの家まで歩き

translation.en: and they drove me up to Doc Albans.
translation.ja: そこから車で医者へ

translation.en: He was waiting on a calf to be born, and he say he ain't had time to see me.
translation.ja: だが医者は “牛の出産で忙しい”と

translation.en: They carried me to Miss Etta, the midwife, and she fixed me up.
translation.ja: 助産師の所へ回され 傷を縫ってもらった

translation.en: My daddy came back and acted like he done accepted the facts of what happened.
translation.ja: 戻った親父は事情を聞いても 平然としてた

translation.en: He got the names of them mans from Mama.
translation.ja: ただ連中の名をお袋に聞いた

translation.en: He found out who they was, and then we announced we was moving out that county. We said goodbye to everybody, all the neighbors.
translation.ja: そして引っ越しを決め 近所の人たちに別れを告げた

translation.en: My daddy went and smiled in the face of one of them crackers who had been with my mama.
translation.ja: お袋を襲った白人にも 親父は笑顔を見せた

translation.en: Smiled in his face…
translation.ja: 笑みを浮かべ―

translation.en: and sold him our land.
translation.ja: 土地を売った

translation.en: We moved over with relations in Caldwell. He got us settled in,
translation.ja: 親戚の家へ身を寄せ お袋と俺が落ち着いた頃―

translation.en: and then he took off one day. I ain't never seen him since.
translation.ja: 親父は突然 姿を消した

translation.en: He sneaked back.
translation.ja: 村へ戻ったんだ

translation.en: Hiding up in the woods, laying to get them eight or nine men.
translation.ja: 森に潜み ８～９人の 犯人集団を待ち伏せて―

translation.en: He got four of them before they got him.
translation.ja: ４人に復讐(ふくしゅう)を果たした

translation.en: They tracked him down in the woods.
translation.ja: 連中は親父を追い―

translation.en: Caught up with him, hung him…
translation.ja: つかまえて吊(つる)し―

translation.en: set him afire.
translation.ja: 火をつけた

translation.en: My daddy wasn't spooked up by the white man. No, sir.
translation.ja: 親父は白人への 立ち向かい方を―

translation.en: And that taught me how to handle them.
translation.ja: 身をもって示した

translation.en: I seen my daddy go up and grin in this cracker's face.
translation.ja: 親父は 白人に向かって 笑顔を見せた

translation.en: Smile in his face and sell him his land.
translation.ja: 笑みを浮かべて いい土地を売る一方で―

translation.en: All the while, he's planning how he's gonna get him
translation.ja: 笑みを浮かべて いい土地を売る一方で― どう復讐するか 冷静に計画を練ってた

translation.en: and what he's gonna do to him.
translation.ja: どう復讐するか 冷静に計画を練ってた

translation.en: That taught me how to handle them.
translation.ja: 俺は親父に学んだ

translation.en: So you all just back up and leave Levee alone about the white man.
translation.ja: あんたらは 下がって見てるがいい

translation.en: I can smile and say "yessir" to whoever I please. I got my time coming to me.
translation.ja: “イエッサー”と言いつつ 俺はタイミングを計ってる

translation.en: You all just leave Levee alone about the white man.
translation.ja: とやかく言わないでくれ

translation.en: [Toledo] ♪ Everybody ♪
translation.ja: エブリバディ

translation.en: Everybody come from different places in Africa, right? Different tribes and things.
translation.ja: 黒人はアフリカ各地から 集められた　部族も様々だ

translation.en: Soon awhile they began to make one big stew.
translation.ja: そして大鍋に入れられ “シチュー”になった

translation.en: You had your, uh, carrots and your peas,
translation.ja: そして大鍋に入れられ “シチュー”になった ニンジンや豆

translation.en: and your potatoes over here. And over there, you had your meat and nuts,
translation.ja: いろんなジャガイモ 肉やナッツ

translation.en: uh, okra, corn.
translation.ja: オクラ　コーン

translation.en: And you mix it up, cook it real good to where the flavors flow through. And then you got one thing.
translation.ja: よく混ぜて 味が染みるまで じっくり煮込んで完成だ

translation.en: You got a stew.
translation.ja: シチューができた

translation.en: Now you take and you eat that stew.
translation.ja: 人は そのシチューを 満喫し―

translation.en: You take and you make your history with that stew.
translation.ja: シチューを使って 歴史も作った

translation.en: But you look around and you see some carrots over there,
translation.ja: だが ふと見回せば ニンジンが残ってる

translation.en: and some peas over here.
translation.ja: だが ふと見回せば ニンジンが残ってる それに豆もある　そう…

translation.en: And… that stew is still there.
translation.ja: それに豆もある　そう… シチューが残ってる

translation.en: Hmm. You done made your history and it's still there.
translation.ja: 歴史を作った後もな

translation.en: You can't eat it all. [laughs]
translation.ja: 食い切れない

translation.en: What you got?
translation.ja: つまり？

translation.en: You got some leftovers. That's what it is.
translation.ja: 残飯があるってことだ

translation.en: See, we's the leftovers. The colored man, he is the leftovers. Huh.
translation.ja: 俺たちは残飯だ 今の黒人は食い残しなんだよ

translation.en: What's the colored man gonna do with himself?
translation.ja: どう生きたらいい？

translation.en: That's what we're waiting to find out.
translation.ja: それを知りたい

translation.en: But first he's got to know that he's a leftover.
translation.ja: まず必要なのは 　　残飯だという自覚だ

translation.en: [Cutler] Mr. Irvin.
translation.ja: アーヴィンさん

translation.en: I ain't got nothing to do with it, but…
translation.ja: 差し出がましいですが―

translation.en: the boy can't do the part. He stutters right through it every time.
translation.ja: 彼に口上は無理かと 吃音(きつおん)がある

translation.en: It's a whole different bottom, though. It's a whole different style.
translation.ja: まるで違うスタイルなんだ

translation.en: I'm just gonna cue you in… [Slow Drag] I know where the four is, man. Don't got to tell me nothing.
translation.ja: 俺が合図をする そしたらニッコリして入れ

translation.en: [Cutler] You're gonna smile and say the line. Then we gonna get goin'.
translation.ja: 俺が合図をする そしたらニッコリして入れ 教えたとおりに言うんだ

translation.en: -Cutler. -Ma'am?
translation.ja: カトラー

translation.en: [Slow Drag] I know it's on the four…
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: Levee got his eyes in the wrong place. You better school him, Cutler.
translation.ja: レヴィーの気が散ってる

translation.en: Come on, Levee. Let's get ready to play. Keep your mind on your work.
translation.ja: レヴィー　音楽に集中しろ

translation.en: Okay, boys. Here we go. Here we go. Here we go.
translation.ja: みんな　始めよう まず“ムーンシャイン･ ブルース”からだ

translation.en: "Moonshine Blues" first. "Moonshine Blues," Ma.
translation.ja: まず“ムーンシャイン･ ブルース”からだ

translation.en: I ain't doing no moonshine nothing. I'm doing "Black Bottom" first.
translation.ja: “ブラックボトム”だよ

translation.en: Come on, Sylvester. Where's Sylvester's mic?
translation.ja: さあ シルヴェスター

translation.en: Irvin, get him a mic.
translation.ja: 甥にマイクを

translation.en: Uh… Ma, the boys say he can't do it.
translation.ja: 彼には無理と聞いた

translation.en: Who? Who say he can't do it? What boys say he can't do it?
translation.ja: 誰に聞いた？ 誰がそんなことを？

translation.en: The band, Ma. The boys in the band.
translation.ja: バンドだよ

translation.en: What band?
translation.ja: バンド？

translation.en: Band work for me.
translation.ja: 仲間だ

translation.en: [Irvin] He stutters, Ma. They say he stutters.
translation.ja: 吃音があるんだろ？

translation.en: I don't care if he do.
translation.ja: だから何？

translation.en: I promised the boy he could do the part, so he gonna do it.
translation.ja: 甥と約束したんだ　やらせる

translation.en: And that's all there is to it. He don't stutter all the time.
translation.ja: 決定だよ うまく言える時もある

translation.en: Get a microphone down here for him.
translation.ja: 甥にマイクを

translation.en: We don't have time. We can't--
translation.ja: 時間がない

translation.en: If you wanna make a record, find the time.
translation.ja: ないなら作るんだね

translation.en: I ain't playing with you. I could walk out of here right now.
translation.ja: ないなら作るんだね 私はツアーに 戻ってもいいんだ

translation.en: Go back to my tour. I don't need to go through all this.
translation.ja: 私はツアーに 戻ってもいいんだ

translation.en: Go get the boy a microphone.
translation.ja: 甥のマイクを用意しな

translation.en: Levee, I know you had something to do with this. Watch yourself.
translation.ja: レヴィー　あんただね？

translation.en: It was Cutler.
translation.ja: カトラーだ

translation.en: It was you. You the only one… [stuttering]
translation.ja: あんただ　あんたしか…

translation.en: The boy stutter. He can't do the part.
translation.ja: ほら 無理だ

translation.en: Can or can't, he gonna do it.
translation.ja: 意見は聞いてない

translation.en: -You ain't got nothing to do with it. -I don't care.
translation.ja: 意見は聞いてない ならご自由に

translation.en: -He can sing the whole song. -Well, all right. Thank you.
translation.ja: ならご自由に ああ そうするよ

translation.en: He's only getting one chance. The cost of this--
translation.ja: １回でやれ　金が…

translation.en: Damn the cost. You always talking about the cost.
translation.ja: お金の話ばかりしないで

translation.en: I make more money for this outfit than anybody else you got put together. If he mess up, he'll do it till he get it right.
translation.ja: 私は一番の稼ぎ頭だよ 甥が成功するまでやる

translation.en: Come on, baby. Come on. Come.
translation.ja: ベイビー おいで さあ 教えたように 手を構えてごらん

translation.en: Stand right there. Hold your hands like I told you to. Okay. Come on.
translation.ja: さあ 教えたように 手を構えてごらん

translation.en: All right. Don't worry about messing up. You mess up, we'll do it till you get it right.
translation.ja: 失敗を怖がらなくていい やり直せるからね

translation.en: All right. Play it for him, Cutler.
translation.ja: 失敗を怖がらなくていい やり直せるからね カトラー

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: One, two, you know what to do.
translation.ja: ワン ツー　さあ 始めるぞ

translation.en: All right, boys,
translation.ja: 皆さん　み…

translation.en: [stuttering] you done seen the best.
translation.ja: 皆さん　み… み… 耳の肥えた皆さんも 驚くはず

translation.en: Now I'm gonna show you the rest.
translation.ja: み… 耳の肥えた皆さんも 驚くはず

translation.en: Ma Rainey's gonna show you her b… b… b…
translation.ja: マ･レイニーのブ…

translation.en: black b… bottom.
translation.ja: ブラック… ボトム

translation.en: That's real good, baby. You take your time. You'll get it right.
translation.ja: 上手だよ 焦らなければ大丈夫

translation.en: [Irvin] Okay, Ma. We're ready to go.
translation.ja: それじゃ本番

translation.en: -Where's my Coke? -"Ma Rainey's Black Bottom," boys.
translation.ja: コーラは？ “ブラックボトム”だ

translation.en: Where's my Coke? I need a Coke. Hot as it is. Shit. I need a Coke.
translation.ja: コーラは？ 暑いしコーラがないと無理

translation.en: What's the matter, Ma?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: Where's my Coke? I need a cold Coca-Cola.
translation.ja: 私のコーラはどこ？

translation.en: Uh, Ma, look…
translation.ja: マ･レイニー

translation.en: I forgot the Coke.
translation.ja: 忘れてた

translation.en: Let's do it without it, huh? Just this one song. What say, boys?
translation.ja: だが１曲だけやろう

translation.en: Damn what the band say. You supposed to have my Coca-Cola. You knew that.
translation.ja: コーラは欠かせないと 知ってるはず

translation.en: I ain't doing nothing without my Coca-Cola.
translation.ja: 歌わないよ

translation.en: -Shit. -[Mel] Just a minute here, Ma. You come in an hour late--
translation.ja: １時間も遅刻して…

translation.en: Get out my face. Irvin, I told you keep him away from me.
translation.ja: 近づかないで もう我慢できん

translation.en: I'm tired of her nonsense. I'm not gonna put up with this.
translation.ja: もう我慢できん

translation.en: Let me. Ma, listen.
translation.ja: 任せろ なあ デリに電話するから まず始めよう

translation.en: I'll call down to the deli and get you a Coke. But let's get started.
translation.ja: なあ デリに電話するから まず始めよう

translation.en: Sylvester's standing there ready to go, the band's all set up. Let's do this one song.
translation.ja: シルヴェスターも バンドも準備できてる

translation.en: Too cheap to buy me a Coca-Cola. I'll buy my own.
translation.ja: コーラ代を渋るの？

translation.en: Slow Drag, Sylvester. Go on, baby.
translation.ja: スロー･ドラッグ シルヴェスター

translation.en: Get me three bottles of Coca-Cola, ice cold. Get y'all something too. -Keep the change. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.ja: 冷えたコーラを３本ね お釣りは取っときな

translation.en: Irvin, get away from me. Shit. You can wait till I get my Coca-Cola. Ain't gonna kill you.
translation.ja: アーヴィン　離れてて コーラを待つんだね

translation.en: Okay, Ma. Get your Coke.
translation.ja: そうか　分かったよ

translation.en: Gentlemen, the band room.
translation.ja: リハ室へ

translation.en: Christ sakes, get your Coke.
translation.ja: まったく コーラか

translation.en: Cutler.
translation.ja: カトラー

translation.en: Come here a minute. I need to talk to you.
translation.ja: 話がある

translation.en: What's all this shit about "the boys in the band said"?
translation.ja: アーヴィンに 何か言ったのか？

translation.en: I tells you what to do. I says what the matter is with the band. I say who can and can't do what.
translation.ja: 指示は私が出すし 誰が何をするかも私が決める

translation.en: We just say 'cause the boy stutter.
translation.ja: 吃音があるから…

translation.en: I know he stutters. Don't you think I know? This is what gonna help him.
translation.ja: だからこそ口上が助けになる

translation.en: We thought it'd be easier--
translation.ja: ただ…

translation.en: He gonna do the part. I don't wanna hear any more of this shit about what the boys in the band says.
translation.ja: あの子がやる 文句は言わせないよ

translation.en: And I want you to find somebody to replace Levee when we get to Memphis.
translation.ja: レヴィーは メンフィスで交代させる

translation.en: Levee ain't nothing but trouble.
translation.ja: 疫病神だ

translation.en: Levee all right. He plays good music when he puts his mind to it.
translation.ja: 奴はその気になれば いい演奏をするし 作曲も

translation.en: -He know how to write music too. -I don't care.
translation.ja: 奴はその気になれば いい演奏をするし 作曲も 関係ない　代わりを見つけて

translation.en: He ain't nothing but bad news.
translation.ja: 関係ない　代わりを見つけて

translation.en: Find somebody else. He the ringtail leader.
translation.ja: 関係ない　代わりを見つけて 甥の文句も 彼が言い出したんだろ

translation.en: I know it was his idea who to say who can do what.
translation.ja: 甥の文句も 彼が言い出したんだろ

translation.en: Dussie Mae! Sit your ass down and stop flaunting yourself around.
translation.ja: ダシー･メイ クネクネしないで！

translation.en: I ain't doing nothing.
translation.ja: 私は別に…

translation.en: Just go somewhere and stay out of the way.
translation.ja: 気が散るから消えて

translation.en: Hi. I just wanted to see what it look like down here.
translation.ja: こんにちは 下の様子を見に来たの

translation.en: Well, come on in.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: I don't bite.
translation.ja: 怖くないよ

translation.en: I didn't know you could write music. I just thought you was jiving me at the club last night.
translation.ja: 作曲を？　自慢げに 吹くだけの人かと

translation.en: No, baby. I knows how to write music.
translation.ja: 曲を作れるとも

translation.en: I done give some of my songs to Mr. Sturdyvant. He say he gonna let me record 'em.
translation.ja: メルさんが レコードを出すって

translation.en: I'm gonna have my own band.
translation.ja: 俺はバンドを持つ

translation.en: Hey, Toledo. Ain't I give Mr. Sturdyvant some of my songs I wrote?
translation.ja: トレド　俺はメルさんに 曲を渡したよな？

translation.en: Don't get Toledo mixed up in nothing.
translation.ja: 俺を巻き込むな

translation.en: You gonna have your own band, sure enough?
translation.ja: 自分のバンドを？

translation.en: -Levee Green and his Footstompers. -[giggles]
translation.ja: レヴィー＆ フット･ストンパーズだ

translation.en: A man what's gonna get his own band need to have a woman like you.
translation.ja: 俺には君のような女が必要だ

translation.en: A woman like me need a man to bring it and put it in my hand.
translation.ja: 私には 貢いでくれる男が必要よ

translation.en: I don't need nobody getting something for nothing and leave me standing in my door.
translation.ja: 遊ばれて捨てられたくない

translation.en: That ain't Levee's style, sugar. I knows how to treat a woman.
translation.ja: そんなことしない 女を大事にするし 贈り物も欠かさない

translation.en: Buy her presents and things. Treat her like she want to be treated.
translation.ja: 女を大事にするし 贈り物も欠かさない

translation.en: That's what they all say till it come time to be buying the presents.
translation.ja: 景気がいいのは口だけじゃ？

translation.en: When we get down to Memphis, I'm gonna take you out,
translation.ja: メンフィスに着いたら デートしよう

translation.en: show you a good time.
translation.ja: 楽しませてやる

translation.en: Show you Levee know how to treat a woman.
translation.ja: レヴィーのやり方でさ

translation.en: Ma.
translation.ja: なあ

translation.en: This "Moonshine Blues," that's one of them songs that Bessie Smith sangs, I believe.
translation.ja: “ムーンシャイン”は ベッシー･スミスの曲だ

translation.en: Bessie what? I ain't thinking about Bessie.
translation.ja: ベッシー？　眼中にないね

translation.en: Shit. I taught Bessie. Bessie ain't doing nothing but imitating me. What I care about Bessie? I don't care if she sell a million record.
translation.ja: 彼女に私が歌を教えたんだ 売れてようが関係ない

translation.en: She got her people. I got mine. I don't care what nobody else do. Ma was the first. Don't you forget it.
translation.ja: 私には私のファンがいる 原点は私だ

translation.en: Nobody said nothing about all that.
translation.ja: そういう話じゃ…

translation.en: -I'm saying that's the song she sang. -I've been doing this a long time. Ever since I was a little girl. I don't care what nobody else do.
translation.ja: 私はキャリアも長いし 唯一無二の存在だ

translation.en: Shoot. That's what get me so mad with Irvin.
translation.ja: だからアーヴィンに腹が立つ

translation.en: White folks try to be put out with you all the time. Too cheap to buy you a damn Coca-Cola.
translation.ja: 白人は文句ばかりで コーラ代も渋る

translation.en: I lets them know it, though. Ma don't stand for no shit.
translation.ja: ナメた態度は許せない

translation.en: Shoot. They wanna take your voice and trap it in all them fancy boxes
translation.ja: お高そうな機械で 私の声を録音したがるくせに

translation.en: with all them buttons and dials, and then too cheap to buy you a Coca-Cola.
translation.ja: お高そうな機械で 私の声を録音したがるくせに １本５セントの コーラさえ渋るとはね

translation.en: Don't cost but a nickel a bottle.
translation.ja: １本５セントの コーラさえ渋るとはね

translation.en: They don't care nothing about me.
translation.ja: 私を見下してるんだ

translation.en: All they want is my voice.
translation.ja: 連中が欲しいのは私の声だけ

translation.en: Well, I done learned that.
translation.ja: そう学んだよ

translation.en: And they gonna treat me the way I want to be treated no matter how much it hurt 'em.
translation.ja: 今は 嫌々でも 要求をのんでくれる

translation.en: They back there right now calling me all kinds of names. Calling me everything but a child of God.
translation.ja: 奥で 私の悪口を 言いまくってるだろうけど

translation.en: But they can't do nothing else 'cause they ain't got what they wanted yet.
translation.ja: それ以外 連中には何もできない

translation.en: As soon as they get my voice down on one them recording machines,
translation.ja: でも望みどおりの歌を 録り終えた瞬間―

translation.en: then it's just like I'd be some whore and they roll over and put their pants on.
translation.ja: 商売女と寝た後みたいに 背中を向ける

translation.en: They ain't got no use for me then.
translation.ja: 私は用なしだ

translation.en: I know what I'm talking about. You watch.
translation.ja: 間違いない　見てな

translation.en: And Irvin, he right there with the rest of them. He don't care nothing about me either.
translation.ja: アーヴィンだって 私を大切に思ってない

translation.en: He's been my manager for six years, and the only time he had me over his house was to sing for some of his white friends.
translation.ja: ６年 マネージャーをしてて 家に招かれたのは１回きり

translation.en: Huh. I know how they do.
translation.ja: 分かるよ

translation.en: Yeah. Shit, you colored and you can make 'em some money,
translation.ja: 黒人でも金になるなら 連中は利用するが―

translation.en: then you all right with them, otherwise you just a dog in the alley.
translation.ja: 黒人でも金になるなら 連中は利用するが― それ以外は野良犬扱いだ

translation.en: I done made them more money from my records than all them other recording artists they got put together,
translation.ja: 所属歌手の売り上げを 全部足した額より―

translation.en: and then they wanna balk about how much this session is costing them.
translation.ja: 私が儲(もう)けさせてるのに “金が…”だとさ

translation.en: I can't see how it's costing as much as they say.
translation.ja: そんなに経費が？

translation.en: Shit, it ain't. I don't pay that kind of talk no mind.
translation.ja: かかってるわけがない

translation.en: -I already got my fellas picked out. -Mmm-hmm.
translation.ja: メンバーも決めた

translation.en: I'm getting me some good fellas. Know how to play real sweet music.
translation.ja: 腕利きを集めて 甘い音楽を奏でる

translation.en: You get your own band, we'll see about this stuff you talking.
translation.ja: 続きはバンドができたら聞く

translation.en: I just wanna show you I knows what the womens like.
translation.ja: 女を喜ばせるのは得意だ

translation.en: They don't call me Sweet Lemonade for nothing.
translation.ja: 別名“スイート･ レモネード”だぞ

translation.en: Stop it now. Somebody gonna come in here.
translation.ja: ダメ　人が来るわ

translation.en: No, they ain't.
translation.ja: 来ないよ

translation.en: Look here, sugar.
translation.ja: なあ いいか

translation.en: What I wants to know is,
translation.ja: 俺が知りたいのは―

translation.en: can I introduce my red rooster to your brown hen.
translation.ja: 俺の雄鶏(おんどり)を 君の雌鶏(めんどり)に 紹介していいかどうか

translation.en: You get your own band and we'll see if your red rooster know how to crow.
translation.ja: バンドを組んだら 雄鶏の声を聞くわ

translation.en: [Levee] Mmm. Damn, baby.
translation.ja: どうだ ベイビー

translation.en: Now I know why my grandpappy sat on the front porch with a straight razor when my grandma hung out the wash.
translation.ja: 祖父は 祖母が洗濯物を 干す時も目を離さなかった

translation.en: You crazy!
translation.ja: おかしな人ね

translation.en: I bet you sound like the midnight train to Alabama
translation.ja: 君はきっと― アラバマ行きの 深夜列車のような声を上げる

translation.en: when it crosses the Mason-Dixon Line.
translation.ja: アラバマ行きの 深夜列車のような声を上げる

translation.en: [Dussie Mae] How you get so crazy?
translation.ja: なぜムチャを？

translation.en: It's women like you that drive me so…
translation.ja: 君みたいな女が 俺をそうさせるんだ

translation.en: -Good God. -[laughing]
translation.ja: すごいな

translation.en: Happy birthday to the lady with the cakes.
translation.ja: 新しい君の誕生だ お祝いしよう

translation.en: Sure done got quiet in here.
translation.ja: 静かになったね

translation.en: I never could stand no silence.
translation.ja: 静かなのは嫌いだ

translation.en: I always got to have some music going on in my head somewhere.
translation.ja: 私の頭の中には音楽がある

translation.en: It keeps things balanced. Music will do that. It fills things up.
translation.ja: 音楽は 隙間を埋めてくれるし―

translation.en: The more music you have in the world, the fuller it is.
translation.ja: 音楽で 世界は豊かになる

translation.en: I can agree with that. I got to have my music too.
translation.ja: 俺の頭の中にも音楽がある

translation.en: White folk don't understand about the blues. They hear it come out, but they don't know how it got there.
translation.ja: 白人にブルースは分からない 成り立ちを知らないからね

translation.en: They don't understand that that's life's way of talking.
translation.ja: ブルースは人生を語る手段だ

translation.en: You don't sing to feel better. You sing 'cause that's a way of understanding life.
translation.ja: 楽しむためじゃなく 人生を理解するためにある

translation.en: The blues help you get out of bed in the morning. You get up knowing you ain't alone.
translation.ja: 朝 起きる力をくれるし 独りじゃないと教えてくれる

translation.en: There's something else in the world.
translation.ja: この世界には―

translation.en: Something's been added by that song.
translation.ja: ブルースによって 足された何かがある

translation.en: This be an empty world without the blues.
translation.ja: ブルースなしじゃ 世界は空っぽ

translation.en: Yeah. I try to take that emptiness and fill it up with something.
translation.ja: その空っぽな世界を 埋めたいんだ

translation.en: I ain't started blues way of singing. Blues always been there.
translation.ja: ブルースを生んだのは 私じゃない

translation.en: But if they wanna call me the Mother of Blues, that's all right with me. It don't hurt none.
translation.ja: でも“ブルースの母”と 呼ばれてもいい

translation.en: Sure did take y'all a long time. Sylvester, get Irvin. Tell him we ready to go.
translation.ja: 遅かったね アーヴィンを呼んできて

translation.en: I'll grab Levee.
translation.ja: 俺はレヴィーを

translation.en: Ma got her Coke, Levee. We about ready to start.
translation.ja: コーラを買った　始めるぞ

translation.en: Okay, boys. "Ma Rainey's Black Bottom," take one.
translation.ja: “マ･レイニーの ブラックボトム” テイク１

translation.en: Two, you know what to do.
translation.ja: ツー　さあ 始めるぞ

translation.en: All right, boys, you… you… d… done…
translation.ja: 皆さん み…

translation.en: Take two.
translation.ja: テイク２

translation.en: All right, boys,
translation.ja: 皆さん

translation.en: you done seen the rest. Now I'm gonna show you the best.
translation.ja: 耳の肥えた皆さんも驚くはず

translation.en: Ma Rainey's gonna show you her… B… B… B…
translation.ja: マ･レイニーのブ…

translation.en: Take…
translation.ja: テイク…

translation.en: Ma, can we just do it without the…
translation.ja: マ･レイニー いっそ口上抜きで…

translation.en: Take six.
translation.ja: テイク６

translation.en: Take seven.
translation.ja: テイク７

translation.en: All right, boys,
translation.ja: 皆さん

translation.en: you done seen the rest. Now I'm gonna show you the best.
translation.ja: 耳の肥えた皆さんも驚くはず

translation.en: Ma Rainey's gonna show you her black bottom.
translation.ja: マ･レイニーの ブラックボトム！

translation.en: Okay, that's good, Ma. That sounded great. Good job, boys.
translation.ja: マ･レイニー 素晴らしかった お疲れさま

translation.en: -See? I told you you could do it! -[laughs] -[Cutler] He did good. -All you gotta do is set your mind to it.
translation.ja: やればできると分かってた

translation.en: -He did better than I thought he would. -My baby.
translation.ja: 想像以上だ

translation.en: -Mwah. That's my baby. -Hey, boy. Hey, boys, Ma.
translation.ja: かわいい子 みんな　マ･レイニー

translation.en: -Yeah! -Hey, let's do "Moonshine Blues" next?
translation.ja: みんな　マ･レイニー 次は“ムーンシャイン･ ブルース”だ　いいね

translation.en: "Moonshine Blues," boys.
translation.ja: 次は“ムーンシャイン･ ブルース”だ　いいね

translation.en: Irv? Something happened with the recording. Check that mic.
translation.ja: アーヴィン　何か変だ マイクを

translation.en: One, one, one, two, check, one--
translation.ja: ワン ワン ワン ツー…

translation.en: No. The problem's with the kid's mic.
translation.ja: シルヴェスターのマイクだ

translation.en: Oh, Christ Almighty!
translation.ja: なんてこった

translation.en: -Ma, we didn't record the song. -Shit!
translation.ja: 録音失敗だ

translation.en: What you mean you didn't record the song? What were you and Sturdyvant doing up there?
translation.ja: 何なの？ 上で遊んでたのかい？

translation.en: [Irvin] Levee must have kicked the plug out.
translation.ja: レヴィーが…

translation.en: I ain't kicked nothing.
translation.ja: 何だ

translation.en: If Levee had his mind on what he was doing.
translation.ja: ちゃんとやれ

translation.en: If it ain't one thing, it's another. Straighten your black ass out.
translation.ja: 問題を起こしてばかりだ

translation.en: Hell, it ain't my fault. I ain't done nothing.
translation.ja: 俺は悪くない

translation.en: It's the cord, Mel. The cord's all chewed up. We need another cord.
translation.ja: コードがボロボロだ 換えないと

translation.en: -[Ma Rainey] Waste of my time. -Where's she going?
translation.ja: マ どこへ？

translation.en: -Shit. -[Irvin] Ma? Ma!
translation.ja: マ･レイニー

translation.en: Ma?
translation.ja: マ

translation.en: If you walk out of this studio, you're through. You're washed-up.
translation.ja: なあ 契約を切るぞ

translation.en: Chrissakes, Mel! Ma!
translation.ja: 黙れ！ マ･レイニー 戻ってきてくれ お願いだ

translation.en: Ma, come back here! Ma, please!
translation.ja: マ･レイニー 戻ってきてくれ お願いだ

translation.en: Listen, Ma.
translation.ja: いいか

translation.en: These records are gonna be hits.
translation.ja: レコードは必ず売れる

translation.en: They are gonna sell like crazy. Hell, even Sylvester will be a star.
translation.ja: 大ヒットして シルヴェスターもスターに

translation.en: Fifteen minutes.
translation.ja: 15分だけ

translation.en: That is all I am asking, Ma. Just 15 minutes.
translation.ja: 私のために 15分だけ待ってくれ

translation.en: Fifteen minutes. You hear me, Irvin? Fifteen minutes.
translation.ja: 15分だけだよ アーヴィン　15分だ

translation.en: Then I'm gonna carry my black bottom on back down to Georgia, you hear me? Fifteen minutes. [scoffs]
translation.ja: 済んだら すぐジョージアに向かう

translation.en: [exhales] You boys go ahead and take a break. Fifteen minutes. We'll be ready to go.
translation.ja: 休憩してくれ 15分後に再開する

translation.en: Don't make no difference to me if she leave. I'm ready to get on outta here, anyway.
translation.ja: 俺は中止して 帰ってもいいがな

translation.en: If I was Mr. Irvin, I'd go on and get them cords and things hooked up right.
translation.ja: 俺ならさっさと コードを換えるね

translation.en: If Levee kept his mind on his work, we wouldn't be in this fix. We'd be up there finishing up.
